The Pentagon is planning to train Saudi Arabian pilots on US soil for what appears to be the first time since a Saudi-led coalition intervened in Yemen’s civil war. The training will be for warplanes including the F-15, which the Saudis are using in Yemen. https://tytnetwork.com/2018/08/30/pentagon-to-train-saudi-pilots-on-us-soil-amid-yemen-uproar/

Under my new bill to #EndCorruptionNow, Americans would be banned from getting paid to lobby for foreign governments. If foreign countries want to express their views and influence policy makers, they should use their diplomats – not straw men who violate campaign finance laws. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1035589177952358400 QT @washingtonpost In guilty plea, American political consultant agreed he steered an illegal foreign donation to Donald Trump's inauguration https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/public-safety/washington-consultant-for-ukraine-party-set-to-plead-guilty-to-violating-lobbyist-disclosure-law/2018/08/31/172cf2c8-ad23-11e8-a8d7-0f63ab8b1370_story.html

“I don't mind a good fight. For reasons known only to God, I've had quite a few tough ones in my life. But I learned an important lesson along the way: In the end, it matters less that you can fight. What you fight for is the real test.” – Senator John McCain

John McCain was a warrior for justice—always on the side of freedom, democracy, and the oppressed. There are things we can learn from him, but he is not replaceable. There is only one John McCain, and we will miss him dearly. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1035590393511981057/img/mueX21drlQo4yw5J.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1035590393511981057/vid/320x180/eLaV96BJekIbZsPd.mp4?tag=8
